testcase.name: TC01_user_should_be_able_to_login_with_manager_profile
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the application_login page.................................passed Given user enters manager_username and manager_password.....................passed Then capture the screenshot.................................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed And verify login "manager" is displayed.....................................passed And user navigates to create_room_reservation_page..........................passed Then capture the screenshot.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC02_user_should_be_able_to_make_reservation
testcase.system-out: Given user enters all required fields.......................................passed And user clicks on the approved checkbox....................................passed And user clicks on the is_paid checkbox.....................................passed And user clicks on the save_button..........................................passed Then user verifies the success_message......................................passed Then capture the screenshot.................................................passed Then close the application..................................................passed
